organizationName.required: Please enter the name of your organization.
organizationName.min: The name of the organization must be at least 3 characters long.
organizationName.max: The name of the organization may be a maximum of 80 characters long.

organizationName.headline: What is the name of your organization or network?
organizationName.label: Name of the organization / network*
organizationName.sameOrganization: Organizations with similar names were found. If you still want to create the organization with the name "{{searchQuery}}", click on "Create organization" again.

organizationTypes.headline: What type of organization is it?
organizationTypes.label: Organization type
organizationTypes.notFound: The type of organization could not be found. Please contact support.

networkTypes.headline: What type of network is it?
networkTypes.label: Network type
networkTypes.notFound: The type of network could not be found. Please contact support.
